title: HEO acquires in-orbit satellite from Satellogic
description:
HEO, the Australian company that performs in-space imaging of spacecraft, has acquired its own satellite though a deal with Satellogic.

The post HEO acquires in-orbit satellite from Satellogic appeared first on SpaceNews.
